Our Campus

Know More Here

Our Campus

St. George College of Management & Science, a dynamic and modern educational institution, was established in 1998 at Bangalore, the ' Silicon Valley' of India, under the the supervision and guidance of St. George Educational and Charitable Trust. The college is situated in OMBR Layout, Banaswadi the easter part of Bangalore. Furnished with suffiecient number of classrooms that are airy and roomy, the College is able to accomodate various under graduate courses as also Post graduate courses in Biotechnology, Microbiology, Biochemistry, MBA and Social Work. The most attractive part of St. George College, of course is its campus.

It provides a serene environment, making it an ideal place for studies. The Infrastructure provisions of the campus give the necessary ease and comfort to the learners. The campus offers facilities to pursue a diversity of curricular and extracurricular activities unmatchable by other institutions. With a view to extend it's academic programme and further infrastructure facilities, the management has recently acquired nearly ten acres of land in which a thoroughly modern state of the art building will come up to meet the ever growing needs of St. George College.

Discover More

Classroom

Our Classrooms

Our Classrooms are spacious, well-ventilated with comfortable seating arrangements. We have Audio Visual Equipment like LCD Projectors and screens for visual presentations, documents for aided teaching. We have internet enabled systems in select classrooms. We conduct Guest Talks & Lectures in our classrooms and seminar halls.

Discover More

Library

Our Library

With sufficient titles from various publishers our library has a voluminous collection of books, covering all subjects including reference work to meet the information needs of the students and faculty. The ambiance and proximity to reach out in choosing books and software installed are of much help to those users of the library facility. In addition to providing prescribed text books, volumes on topics furnishing more details and information are accessible through reference books, eBooks, journals, periodicals and magazines. As is the case with library service the students are allowed to borrow books for a specified period of time. Library facility is available from 8:30 Hrs to 19:30 Hrs on all working days.

Discover More

Computer Lab

Our Computer Labs

We have a spacious, fully air-conditioned and well-planned computer lab with the latest hi-tech configuration of hardware and software to support all the academic and additional programme. We are also fortunate to have more than 80 nodes with updated peripherals, higher end operation and application software. LAN system with two Windows NT Servers. Internet Connections & Web Browsing facility. Computer Lab Facility is available from 8.30 Hrs to 17:30 Hrs

Discover More

Transportation

Our Transportation

The college has buses plying around the city, picking up students and bring them to college on time. The buses are available to the students for University related works as well.

Discover More

Sports & Games

Sports & Games

St. George College of Management, Science & Nursing also focuses on the health and wholesome development of its students by providing opportunities for both outdoor and indoor games and sports activities. Students are encouraged to take part in various sports competitions at local, regional and National Levels. Presently the sports facilities available are in respect of games such as badminton, cricket, football, table tennis, volleyball and track events. Sports meets are conducted periodically inviting from peer- group institutions.

Discover More

Cultural Programme

Cultural Programme

The reason that we encourage cultural programme is to value the talents of the students and to make them realize their own potential. We arrange occasional Cultural Meets to make the participants extroverts so as to acquire the social grace to share their talents with others from different backgrounds and culture. All such cultural meets are organized in consultation with stalwarts from bith academic and industrial backgrounds. The mesmerizing and fascinating youth gala aims at interfacing every student in exposing his or her talents.

Discover More

Hostel

Our Hostel

Hostel Facilities are provided for boys and girls separately, with rooms spacious and comfortable. Focus on the maintenance of the hostel facility is on hygiene for healthyliving, nutritious food for vigour and strength, Lounges with TV, Newspapers and magazines for entertainment and amusement. The presence always in the hostel of a qualified warden for guidance and counselling is a source of comfort and encouragement to students who are away from parental guidance and support. Students though are from all over India and abroad with varied culture, language, traditions and customs, yet sharing rooms and other amenities, help promote and develop understanding and appreciation of the variations enhancing feeling of unity and a sense of national and international integrity.

Discover More

Canteen

Our Canteen

A fast food center is functioning for short eats in campus apart from a mess for lunch. This takes care of the student's need for snacks and soft drinks sold at a reasonable rate.
